title: Baaghi
writer: Shifuji Shaurya Bharadwaj, Sanjeev Datta, Sanjeev Dutta
short_cast: Tiger Shroff, Shraddha Kapoor, Sudheer Babu, Paras Arora, Sunil Grover, Sourav Chakraborty, Shaurya Bhardawaj
cast: Tiger Shroff, Shraddha Kapoor, Sudheer Babu, Paras Arora, Sunil Grover, Sourav Chakraborty, Shaurya Bhardawaj
genre: Martial Arts Movies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Action & Adventure
desc: A martial artist faces his biggest test when he has to travel to Bangkok to rescue the woman he loves from the clutches of his romantic rival.
